== Description ==

Returns the [[Glossary#Permalink|permalink]] for a post with a custom post type.

== Usage ==

%%% <?php echo post_permalink( $ID ); ?> %%%
Echos the permalink url for the ID passed in

== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$post_id|integer|ID of the post or page that you wish to retrieve the link for.|required|0 }}
